ref: 10941 *lappasikā -- : lapaī f. ʻ the glutinous dish ʼ (cf. *lappa -- 1 with meanings resembling Eng. to lap; cf. also kcch. lepsṇū ʻ to slip ʼ).
10941 *lappasikā ʻ a sweetmeat or dish ʼ. [lapsikā -- f. ʻ a partic. prepared food ʼ Bhpr. sanskritized from MIA.]
Pk. lappasiyā -- f. ʻ a sweetmeat ʼ;
S. lapsī f. ʻ a kind of glutinous sweetmeat ʼ;
H. lāpsī f. ʻ a kind of glutinous farinaceous food ʼ;
H. lāpsī f. ʻ a kind of glutinous farinaceous food ʼ;
G. lāpśī f. ʻ a dish of wheat flour and molasses ʼ;
M. lāpśī, lāphśī f. ʻ dilute preparation of milk with coconut milk and sugar ʼ.
